column3: @morcos here's #6449 on top of #6416 : https://github.com/jtimon/bitcoin/commits/morcos-6449-over-6416\n\nStaging replacements and then remove them at the end of AcceptToMemoryPool in some way or another has been something that many people have tried, but working on alternatives to the "first seen" spend conflicts resolution policy was never a priority. Now it seems more priority than ever: apart
